text: Falao zu zhong yige mimi gui xin de xinshi shuo:“Yige ren ji yi nimen de zhu fachu de ruogan mingzheng zhaoshi nimen zhihou, yinwei ta shuo,‘wo de zhu shi zhenzhu’, nimen jiu yao shalu ta ma? Ruguo ta shi yige shuohuang zhe, name, ta zi shou huangyan zhi hai; ruguo ta shi yige chengshi zhe, name, tasuoyong yi donghe nimen de zainan, jiang you yibufen lailin nimen, zhenzhu biding bu yindao guofen de chang shuohuangyan zhe
